title: England rugby players tap into secrets of triumphant cricketing counterparts
text:
England's rugby players are tapping into the secrets of their cricketing counterparts' success via Jamie George, who has been in regular contact in Japan with batsman Sam Billings.

George, 29, and Billings, 28, have been firm friends since sharing a room while boarding at the illustrious Haileybury public school. While Billings missed the one-day World Cup triumph in July after dislocating his shoulder, he remains a key dressing room figure, and has since been named vice-captain for the five-match IT20 series in New Zealand.

He described England's rugby display against the same as "incredible" last week, and a source close to the two friends confirmed they had been chatting regularly on WhatsApp...
description: England's rugby players are tapping into the secrets of their cricketing counterparts' success via Jamie George, who has been in regular contact in Japan with batsman Sam Billings.
